captions.text:
Zlatan here with amazing news
about the live Google Hangout

Hey, Zlatan. When is your
live Google Hangout?

Start submitting your
questions to #AskZlatan now,

and the favorites will be chosen
to join the Google Hangout.

If I don't get chosen,
can I still watch?

Yet another perfect question,
Cowboy Zlatan!

Anyone can watch as long as
they have the Internet and good taste!

What kind of questions
should we ask, Zlatan?

Wow, great straight-forward,
informational question, Tiny Zlatan!
but the more football related the better.

Remember, Zlatan always
risks everything on the pitch,
and is as Zlatan as he can be at all times.
So your questions should be too!

I would just like to add that
you are all very good looking!
Ok, Ok everyone. One at a time.

Click lower left to ask a
question, right to RSVP.

title: Zlatan Live Google+ Hangout Announcement: #AskZlatan Anything July 12
